title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
OB: The 'Update' action in the Test Suite does not display the content of the existing files or allow for modification. It does not provide an option to remove the existing files.
EB: The 'Update' action should show the content of the existing files (e.g., directories, zip files) and allow for modification. Additionally, there should be an option to remove the existing files. To resolve this issue, consider renaming the action (and the corresponding dialog) to 'Recreate Test Suite' to better reflect the functionality.
SR:
1. Navigate to the Test Suite.
2. Select the 'Update' action.
3. Observe that it does not display the content of the existing files or provide an option to remove them.
